                            cin >> a[i];
                        }
                        int l = 0, r = n - 1;
                        int ans = 0;
                        long long suml = 0, sumr = 0;
                        while (l <= r) {
                            if (suml < sumr) {
                                suml += a[l];
                                l++;
                            } else {
                                sumr += a[r];
                                r--;
                            }
                            if (suml == sumr) {
                                ans = l + (n - 1 - r);
                            }
                        }
                        cout << ans << '\n';
                    }
                }
